## Méthodes et outils des sciences des territoires, une perspective Nord-Sud

::: {#map}
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(sf)
library(leaflet)

lat = 6.349879282633317
lng = 2.0875418515099504


file <- 'https://www.centrelogivac.org/wp-content/uploads/2021/09/DJI_0084-450x253.jpg'

# Création d'un point (localisation centre des colloques)
ptsfg <- st_point(c(lng, lat)) 
ptsfc <- st_sfc(ptsfg, crs = (4326))
ptdf <- data.frame(id= 1, name = "UMR8504")
Here <- st_sf(ptdf,geometry = ptsfc)

icons <- awesomeIcons(
  icon = 'ios-people',
  iconColor = 'white',
  library = 'ion',
  markerColor = 'blue'
)


# Affichage du point - carte interactive
mamap <- leaflet(Here, width = 350, height = 170) %>%
            setView( lat = lat+2, lng = lng, zoom = 6) %>% addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") %>%
             addAwesomeMarkers( icon = icons,popup = paste0("<img src = ", file,  " width = 160>", "<br /><p style='text-align:center;'><a href='https://www.irsp-ouidah.org/' style='font-size:12pt;'>Institut Régional</br>de Santé Publique</br>Comlan Alfred Quenum</a></p>"))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
mamap
```
:::
